Package simulator.method

Implementation of approximate/statistical model checking techniques using the discrete event simulation engine.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACIconfidence
    SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
    ACIiterations
    SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
    ACIwidth
    SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
    APMCapproximation
    SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
    APMCconfidence
    SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
    APMCiterations
    SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
    APMCMethod
    SimulationMethod class(es) for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
    CIconfidence
    SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
    CIiterations
    SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
    CIMethod
    SimulationMethod class(es) for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
    CIwidth
    SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
    SimulationMethod
    Classes to control simulation-based (approximate/statistical) model checking.
    SPRTMethod
    SimulationMethod class for the SPRT (Sequential probability ratio test) approach, as used by Younes/Simmons (CAV'02).

Package simulator.method Description

Implementation of approximate/statistical model checking techniques using the discrete event simulation engine.
